content.text: Second Half ends, Burnley 1, Chelsea 2.
Foul by Kevin Long (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Davide Zappacosta (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Victor Moses with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by James Tarkowski.
Foul by Kevin Long (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Jack Cork (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Kevin Long.
Matthew Lowton (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Burnley. Sam Vokes replaces Chris Wood.
Goal!  Burnley 1, Chelsea 2. Victor Moses (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Emerson with a cross.
Emerson (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ashley Barnes (Burnley).
Goal!  Burnley 1, Chelsea 1. Ashley Barnes (Burnley) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson.
Attempt blocked. Johann Berg Gudmundsson (Burnley) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ashley Westwood.
Attempt saved. Victor Moses (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pedro.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) because of an injury.
Kevin Long (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Gary Cahill.
Matthew Lowton (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Burnley. Matthew Lowton tries a through ball, but Chris Wood is caught offside.
First Half ends, Burnley 0, Chelsea 1.
Kevin Long (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Olivier Giroud (Chelsea).
Kevin Long (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Nick Pope.
Attempt missed. Chris Wood (Burnley) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson with a cross.
Foul by Victor Moses (Chelsea).
Johann Berg Gudmundsson (Burnley) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
James Tarkowski (Burnley) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by James Tarkowski (Burnley).
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Burnley. Matthew Lowton tries a through ball, but Chris Wood is caught offside.
Own Goal by Kevin Long, Burnley.  Burnley 0, Chelsea 1.
Pedro (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jack Cork (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Pedro (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Olivier Giroud.
Offside, Burnley. Nick Pope tries a through ball, but Ashley Barnes is caught offside.
Jack Cork (Burnley) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Emerson (Chelsea).
Attempt blocked. Olivier Giroud (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Victor Moses with a cross.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Gary Cahill (Chelsea).
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
